remarks.format:
## Remarks The class LoadItemsEventArgs object provides event data with information about how many items to load into the control on demand.
## Examples The following code example demonstrates how the <xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.List.OnLoadItems%2A> event calls the function `LoadNow`. The <xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.LoadItemsEventArgs.ItemIndex%2A> property determines the number of items to be added to an array that is bound to a list. In order to see the effects of this example, you must view the page on a device that can paginate the list.
> [!NOTE] > The following code sample uses the single-file code model and may not work correctly if copied directly into a code-behind file. This code sample must be copied into an empty text file that has an .aspx extension. For more information, see [ASP.NET Web Forms Page Code Model](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
